ygData.msgSnippet: ... Man, that s comforting to know.  sheesh.  Remind me not to lose my corpse anytime soon. Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody. League of Antonican
ygData.messageBody:
>What ever gave you the idea they backed up nightly?
>From what I've seen, from people who have lost all
>the items on their characters and have actually been
>offered a restore of their character information, Verant
>backs up once ever week or possibly 2 weeks

Man, that's comforting to know. sheesh. Remind me not
to lose my corpse anytime soon.

Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
